item.title: Nonwild
item.dc:creator: @newton37 newton37
item.description:
@newton37 wrote:

When I try to add non-wild areas i get 100 errors, I add the 2nd if statement "if(absY = 3960…

public boolean nonWild() { if (absY >= 2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112) ||if(absY = 3960 && absY = 3960 && absX = 3092 && absX = 3094); return true; else if return false; }

and heres the errors i get, actually i get 100 errors but i wont post em all here, i believe they’re errors because of ‘else’ without ‘if’.

client.java:1497: 'else' without 'if' else if ^ client.java:1501: class, interface, or enum expected public int untradable[] = {6570,1038,1040,1042,1044,1046,1048}; // put all untra dable itemz here bitchz XD - xero
